name: Battle - Royal Flush
description:
Play as a gambling chip as you try to survive the onslaught of dice probability. Gather cards for a Royal Flush (all cards the same suit) and win big!
Each card in your hand gives abilities you can upgrade by rolling the dice under it. Higher role equals more power! But remember you are still after that Royal Flush! Dice drop xp, collect to have a chance at an upgrade or switch the cands in your hand. 

Please post a screenshot of your winning hands in the comments below!

Controls:

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Shoot

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
